text: aladhin 'uljyu 'iilaa alkhuruj min dyarhm, la lishay' faealuh 'iilaa li'anahum 'aslamuu wqalu: rabuna allah whdh. walawla ma shreh allah min dafe alzulm walbatil balqtal lahuzim alhqq fi kuli 'umat wlkhrbt alard, whuddimt fiha 'amakin alebadt min sawamie alrhban, wakanayis alnsara, wmeabd alyhwd, wamasajid almuslimin alty ysllun fyha, wydhkrwn asm allah fiha kthyrana. wamin ajthd fi nsrt din allh, fa'iina allah nasrh ealaa edwh. 'iina allah laqwy la yghalab, eaziz la yram, qad qhr alkhlayq wa'akhadh bnwasyhm
